anya-e0105n20:1_0: Bahū pana ādhunikā vicakkhaṇā dhammānandādayo “ācariyabuddhaghosatthero dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhiko”ti vadanti.
anya-e0105n20:1_3: Tathā hi buddhavaṁsaṭṭhakathāya ca abhidhammāvatāraṭṭhakathāya ca vinayavinicchayaṭṭhakathāya ca kārako
anya-e0105n20:1_4: ācariyabuddhadattatthero coḷaraṭṭhe tambapaṇṇinadiyaṁ uraganagare jāto ācariyabuddhaghosena ekakāliko ca.
anya-e0105n20:1_10: Khuddakanikāyapariyāpannaudānādipāḷiyā saṁvaṇṇanābhūtāya paramatthadīpaniyā kārako ācariyadhammapālattheropi dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe kañcipurajātiko.
anya-e0105n20:4_0: Ettha ca kañcipuraṁ nāma madarasanagarassa īsakaṁ pacchimanissite dakkhiṇadisābhāge pañcacattālīsamilappamāṇe
anya-e0105n20:7_0: Pubbe mayūradūta mayūrarūpa (sī.), mayūrasutta (syā.) paṭṭanamhi saddhiṁ vasantenā”ti – vuttaṁ.
anya-e0105n20:8_0: Ettha ca mayūradūtapaṭṭanaṁ nāma idāni madarasanagarasamīpe milapora iti voharitaṭṭhānanti porāṇappavattigavesīhi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0105n20:9_0: Imāhi pana nigamanagāthāhi dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭheyeva nivutthapubbataṁ pakāseti,
anya-e0105n20:9_2: marammaraṭṭhe vā nivutthapubbatāya pakāsanañca na dissati.
anya-e0105n20:9_3: Tena ācariyabuddhaghoso dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhiko na hotīti na sakkā paṭikkhipituṁ.
anya-e0105n20:11_0: “Yaṁ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘aparikkhitte pamukhe anāpattīti bhūmiyaṁ vinā jagatiyā pamukhaṁ sandhāya kathita’nti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0105n20:11_1: taṁ andhakaraṭṭhe pāṭekkasannivesā ekacchadanā gabbhapāḷiyo sandhāya vutta”nti.
anya-e0105n20:12_0: Iminā pana vacanena “andhakaṭṭhakathā andhakaraṭṭhikehi therehi katā”ti pākaṭā hoti,
anya-e0105n20:12_1: ācariyabuddhaghosopi ca andhakaṭṭhakathāya sandhāyabhāsitampi tandesikagabbhapāḷisannivesākārampi suṭṭhu jānāti,
anya-e0105n20:12_2: tasmā tandesiko na hotīti na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0105n20:13_2: Ettha ca kheṭoti padassa gāmoti vā,
anya-e0105n20:13_4: khuddakanagaranti vā tayo atthā sakkatābhidhāne pakāsitā,
anya-e0105n20:13_5: dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhesu ca yāvajjatanāpi gāmo kheḍāti voharīyati.
anya-e0105n20:13_8: tena moraṇḍakheṭakavattabbenāti vacanatthaṁ katvā “moraṇḍagāme jātoti vattabbena therenā”ti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0105n20:13_9: Idāni pana dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe guntājanapade nāgārajunakoṇḍato ekapaṇṇāsamilamatte (51) amaravatito
anya-e0105n20:13_10: ca aṭṭhapaṇṇāsamilamatte (58) padese kotanemalipurīti ca gundalapallīti ca voharitaṁ ṭhānadvayamatthi,
anya-e0105n20:13_14: tasmā taṁ ṭhānadvayameva pubbe moraṇḍakheṭoti voharito ācariyabuddhaghosassa jātigāmo bhaveyyāti porāṇaṭṭhānagavesīhi gahito.
anya-e0105n20:13_15: Yasmā panetaṁ “moraṇḍakheṭakavattabbenā”ti padaṁ “moraṇḍagāmajātenā”ti padaṁ viya pāḷinayānucchavikaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0105n20:13_16: aññehi ca bahūhi visesanapadehi ekato aṭṭhatvā visesyapadassa pacchato visuṁ ṭhitaṁ,
anya-e0105n20:13_18: tasmā etaṁ kenaci taṁkālikena ācariyassa jātiṭṭhānaṁ sañjānantena pakkhittaṁ viya dissatīti.
anya-e0105n20:14_0: Imesu pana tīsu “ācariyabuddhaghoso bodhimaṇḍasamīpe jātoti ca marammaraṭṭhikoti ca dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhiko”ti
anya-e0105n20:14_1: ca vuttavacanesu pacchimameva balavataraṁ hoti ācariyasseva vacananissitattā,
anya-e0105n20:14_2: tasmā tadeva nissāya ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa uppatti evaṁ veditabbā.
